decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Gates to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategy while maintaining card advantage. It aims to stall the game with early removal and creatures like Squadron Hawk and Sacred Cat, while utilizing Counterspell and Prismatic Strands to protect key pieces. Lórien Revealed provides card draw and The Modern Age offers a finisher. Guardian of the Guildpact and Dawnbringer Cleric provide additional threats and disruption. The deck relies on efficient removal spells like Journey to Nowhere and Destroy Evil to deal with opposing threats, ultimately out-valuing the opponent in the late game.

This deck focuses on using control elements such as Counterspell and Journey to Nowhere to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also utilizing the Gates mechanic to gain card advantage and mana fixing. The main win condition lies in maintaining board control through efficient removal spells and resilient creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact, while generating card advantage with Squadron Hawk and Preordain. The deck also aims to protect itself with Prismatic Strands and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Dispel. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through efficient resource management.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying cheap creatures and using efficient removal spells to control the board and deal damage to the opponent. With cards like Glint Hawk and Kor Skyfisher to provide value and tempo, combined with burn spells like Galvanic Blast and Lightning Bolt for reach, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game. By utilizing efficient creatures and removal, along with artifact synergies, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats while disrupting their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using a combination of removal spells like Cast Down and Defile, along with creatures like Crypt Rats and Avenging Hunter to clear the board. The deck also utilizes cards like Ichor Wellspring and Deadly Dispute for card advantage, as well as Fanatical Offering and Reckoner's Bargain to generate extra value. The Golgari Garden archetype focuses on creating a steady stream of creatures and resources while disrupting the opponent's game plan through removal and sacrifice effects.

The main focus of this UR Control deck is to efficiently control the board and disrupt the opponent's plans with a combination of counterspells, burn spells, and powerful creatures. By using counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce, as well as removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Skred, the deck can prevent the opponent from establishing a strong board presence. Augur of Bolas and Murmuring Mystic provide additional card advantage and threats, while cards like Lórien Revealed and Tolarian Terror can help maintain board control. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game by utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with counterspells like Counterspell and Spellstutter Sprite, while also removing threats with cards like Snuff Out and Cast Down. Additionally, the deck includes card draw spells like Preordain and Augur of Bolas to maintain card advantage. The inclusion of cards like Thorn of the Black Rose and Ninja of the Deep Hours also provide additional value and card advantage, helping the deck to outlast and outplay opponents in a Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

The main theme of this Golgari Garden Control deck is to establish board control through a combination of removal spells and creature sacrifices, while generating card advantage through sacrificing artifacts like Ichor Wellspring. The deck also focuses on generating tokens with cards like Khalni Garden and Thorn of the Black Rose. Crypt Rats serve as a board wipe option while cards like Avenging Hunter and Defile provide targeted removal. Overall, this deck aims to grind out the opponent through attrition while maintaining a strong presence on the battlefield.

The main concept of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Spirited Companion, Inspiring Overseer, and Goliath Paladin. Utilizing cards like Ephemerate and Chainer's Edict for control and removal, the deck aims to maintain board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes some lifegain options like Kabira Crossroads and Dawnbringer Cleric to help survive aggressive opponents. Overall, the deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive strategy with a mix of creatures, removal, and control elements to outpace and outlast the opponent.
